title: Cat King System - Novel Updates
tags: Animal Characteristics   Animal Rearing   Appearance Changes   Cute Story   Modern Day   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Pets   Shapeshifters   Transformation Ability   Transmigration   World Hopping
author: Xiao Zhuan Shang   小篆伤
description:
From adorable orange cats and ragdolls to ferocious lynx and clouded leopards, Yu Jiatang will always transmigrate as a cat.

Yu Jiatang: Poop scooping officer, I allow you to take a nap with me today.

Poop scooping officer: …Thank you Lord for your kindness ^_^

The MC has to undergo a physical transformation every time he transmigrates and has cheats to upgrade various attributes. Unless there’s an accident, he won’t experience any illnesses.>
